title: Star Guardian MISSIONS
body: Add me " Bunny " on OCE if you'd like to do the 5 man missions to get your tokens before times up :)

replies.body: Hey, I added you to complete the 5 man missions. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Hi Bunny, I'm interested in doing the 5 man mission with you. I've just recently started the missions, and noticed I'm a little behind. I can do ahri and soraka somewhat decently, what time will you be on?
